msbt.message: Alright, is that everyone? Let's see
Is here?
And how about ?
And there's , of course!
Great! We're all here.
I'll turn it over to you, Mr. Nook. Our three adventurers are ready to get started!
Yes, yes! Very good!
Let's see, how shall I begin
Yes, of course. Welcome, everyone! Welcome to your new island.My name is Tom Nook, and I'm the founder and president of Nook Inc. Yes, yes!
Today is the first day of your new life on this pristine, lovely island. So, congratulations!
And this is a package deal, hm?As such, Nook Inc. staff will always be here to support you and ensure your comfort and safety.

Butfirst things first. Yes, yes!I'd like each of you to choose a spot of your own. It's the first step to putting down some real roots! I'd like you to dream bigâ€”I do have certain connections in construction and real estate, and Ah, but I'm getting ahead of myself. Let's just get started with a simple tent, shall we? Please collect your tent from Timmy or Tommy and then choose a spot to place it.
President Nook! I've got here!
Hello, hello! So you're our new resident, ?Welcome to !I'm Tom Nook, manager of this island and president and CEO of Nook Inc.
Originally this was a deserted island, so Nook Inc. offered a Deserted Island Getaway Package.We're a lot less deserted now, but we still accept new residents.
Now, , as to the matter of where you'll rest your sleepy head at night
There! A little comfort item for you.

And, erI'm terribly sorry, but due to a slight mix-up, we weren't able to prepare a place for you to live yet If you could, take a look around and set up your tent wherever you like.That shouldn't be a problem, right? After all, it's in keeping with our original "deserted island" theme!
There's something else you'll need as well
And, finally, the most important item of all
Yes, yes, you've Huh?<10_7 arg="90" />Hey, ! You don't have any money at all!
Oh no! No Bells, ?It's crazy, honestly. So many of my customers arrive here without two Bells to rub together
Now, if I could turn your attention to the Resident Services tent just behind meWe're there 24 hours a day to support you, so stop by any time you have something on your mind.
Now, if I could turn your attention to the Resident Services tent behind meI'm there 24 hours a day to support you, so stop by any time you have something on your mind.
ThoughTomorrow we'll be closed for construction of a new Resident Services building.You should stop by at least once today. Enjoy it while you can!

Now, if I could turn your attention to the veiled building behind me. This is where you'll find Resident Services.As you might have guessed, it's under construction today, so I'm afraid it's not open at the moment.I'm very sorry we won't be able to offer much in the way of support today. I do hope you understand.Construction will be finished by tomorrow, so stop by then, hm?
Now, if I could turn your attention to the Resident Services building behind meThe delightful Isabelle and I are there 24 hours a day to support you, so stop by to consult with us whenever!

HoweverTomorrow happens to be New Year's Eve, you see, so it will be closed all day for our Countdown event.Since we're closed tomorrow, I highly recommend you stop in at least once today. Enjoy it while you can!

If I could turn your attention to the building behind me That's our Resident Services building.It happens to be closed today for our New Year's Eve Countdown event, though.I'm very sorry we won't be able to offer you much in terms of support today, but I hope you understand.We'll be back open tomorrow, so enjoy the final day of the year. And come by to see us!
